articles.author: Jeff Fletcher
articles.title: Yankees’ Aaron Judge wins tight race to take home his third AL MVP, and second in a row - BBWAA
articles.description: New York Yankees' slugger Aaron Judge earned four more first-place votes than Seattle Mariners' catcher Cal Raleigh to win the American League MVP. Judge outpolled Raleigh, 17-13, in first-place votes. It was the closest MVP race since 2019, when Mike Trout w…
articles.content:
New York Yankees’ slugger Aaron Judge earned four more first-place votes than Seattle Mariners’ catcher Cal Raleigh to win the American League MVP.
